decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 1140_211PL_GF_X000; 1140_211PL_GF_X001; 1140_211PL_GF_X002; 1140_211PL_GF_X003; 1140_211PL_GF_D101 Rev B; 1140_211PL_GF_D102 Rev A; 1140_211PL_GF_D105 Rev A; 1140_211PL_GF_D106 Rev A; 1140_211PL_GF_D107 Rev A; 1140_211PL_GF_D108 Rev A Date Received 02/10/2024; Armstrong Simmons Fire Safety Strategy dated 25th July 2024; Site Photos
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved side and rear rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey rear/side infill extension and single storey rear extension, following the partial demolition of the boundary wall.
